testCase.desc: Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the audio description setting
Check if the event is triggered when the audio description enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the caption setting
Check if the event is triggered when the caption enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the pincontrol setting
Check if the event is triggered when the pincontrol enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the LiveWatershed setting
Check if the event is triggered when the livewatershed enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the PlaybackWatershed setting
Check if the event is triggered when the playbackwatershed enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the BlockNotRatedContent setting
Check if the event is triggered when the BlockNotRatedContent enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the PinOnPurchase setting
Check if the event is triggered when the pinOnPurchase enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the HighContrast setting
Check if the event is triggered when the HighContrastChanged enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the VoiceGuidance setting
Check if the event is triggered when the VoiceGuidanceChanged enabled status changes
Verifying the enable/disable functionality of the VoiceGuidanceHints setting
Check if the event is triggered when the VoiceGuidanceHintsChanged enabled status changes
Check whether the contentpin can be successfully set and retrieved
Check if the event is triggered when the content pin status changes
Check whether the privacymode can be successfully set and retrieved
Check if the event is triggered when the privacy mode status changes
Check whether the preferred audio languages can be successfully set and retrieved
Check if the event is triggered when the preferred audio languages status changes
Check whether the presentation language can be successfully set and retrieved
Check if the event is triggered when the presentation language status changes
Verify setAudioDescription with enabled set to an empty string to ensure the API handles empty values appropriately
Verify setAudioDescription with enabled set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input
Verify setAudioDescription with enabled set to a numeric value to ensure the API rejects non-boolean input
Verify the setAudioDescription API behavior when the enabled parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly
Verify setCaptions with enabled set to an empty string to ensure the API handles empty values appropriately
Verify setCaptions with enabled set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input
Verify setCaptions with enabled set to a numeric value to ensure the API rejects non-boolean input
Verify the setCaptions API behavior when the enabled parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly

Verify setPinControl with pinControl set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input
Verify setPinControl with pinControl set to a numeric value to ensure the API rejects non-boolean input
Verify setPinControl API behavior when the pinControl parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly
Verify setLiveWatershed with liveWatershed set to an empty string to ensure the API handles empty values appropriately
Verify setLiveWatershed with liveWatershed set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input

Verify setLiveWatershed API behavior when the liveWatershed parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly

Verify setPlaybackWatershed with playbackWatershed set to a numeric value to ensure the API rejects non-boolean input
Verify setPlaybackWatershed API behavior when the playbackWatershed parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly

Verify setBlockNotRatedContent API behavior when the blockNotRatedContent parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly
Verify setPinOnPurchase with pinOnPurchase set to an empty string to ensure the API handles empty values appropriately
Verify setPinOnPurchase with pinOnPurchase set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input
Verify setPinOnPurchase with pinOnPurchase set to a numeric value to ensure the API rejects non-boolean input
Verify setPinOnPurchase API behavior when the pinOnPurchase parameter is omitted, to ensure it handles the scenario correctly
Verify setHighContrast with enabled set to an empty string to ensure the API handles empty values appropriately
Verify setHighContrast with enabled set to a special character to ensure the API rejects special character input
